description.narrative: Early Child Development (ECD) M&E framework reviewed, widely disseminated and utilised for monitoring progress of Early Child Development (ECD) target indicators, which contributes to Field Office Oversight, Management And Operations Support, Field/Country Office Oversight, Management And Operations Support, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Programme Support

sector.narrative: Country programme process (including UNDAF planning and CCA)
Digital learning materials and ICT in education
HQ and RO technical support to multiple Goal Areas
Management and Operations support at CO

description.narrative: Other General Services other general services

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: In 2018, the funding levels for UNICEF Malawi increased by 12 per cent and as at year-end the utilization of regular resources (RR), other resources (OR) and other resources for emergencies (ORE) were 100 per cent, 96 per cent and 95 per cent, respectively. | Status:Met | As-of Date:21/12/2018
